result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Domminic Salvatore Canzoneri

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Domminic Salvatore Canzoneri appeared by video.  Attorney John Theodore Chisholm in court for State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Defendant requests State Public Defender representation. Court instructed the defendant to contact SPD Office to determine eligibility.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 15.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court orders defendant to report to the Milwaukee County Jail by 5:00 pm on 09-23-2022 to be booked and released. Failure to report will result in the issuance of a bench warrant.

Defendant Domminic Salvatore Canzoneri in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20,right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant may hire private counsel. Case adjourned for Pretrial Conference, Br 15.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Domminic Salvatore Canzoneri
Current: 1201 S Tenth Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-21-2022)
Prior: 8974 South Chicago Road, Oak Creek, WI 53154

Domminic Salvatore Canzoneri not in court. 
Defendant is in in-patient treatment. Court allowing time for Defendant to appear in person. 
Case adjourned back to Out of Custody Court, Safety Building Room 221.
Letter from CORE Treatment Services re:  defendant and postponement of upcoming hearing.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 9/21/22 @ 2:30p
